summary: Diff updates the PlayerJet rendering to use a jet sprite with thruster effects gated by isThrusting, and adjusts gameplay constants in GameScreen (including reducing BULLET_SPAWN_OFFSET and introducing OBSTACLES_PER_LEVEL = 5). GameOverlay adds pointer-capture based continuous firing behavior. Core REQ goals appear addressed at a high level, but some acceptance-criteria details (e.g., bullet spawn alignment and per-level obstacle target usage in logic/UI) are not fully verifiable from the truncated diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Continuous firing via pointer capture / firing-on-pointerdown behavior in the overlay (including mobile right-side-only firing logic).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on bullet spawn position, obstacle scaling per level, and jet visuals; it does not request changes to firing input mechanics.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad gameplay tuning and additional mechanics/constants (e.g., large speed increases, boss-related constants like BOSS_MAX_HITS, boss size, countdown timer state fields) beyond the requested bullet-spawn-position and obstacle-count scaling.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for changing movement/bullet/obstacle speeds, adding boss-related balancing, or adding a level countdown timer.
